page.title: 20HOME ENTERTAINMENT CONT'D
page.content:
{COMPUTERS} An increasingly popular form of entertainment, mainly used by children to play games 43% have 1,2% have 2 and 1% possess 3 or more. {VIDEO RECORDER} 54% possess 1 video. Used mainly for recording T.V. programmes or for video films which are hired from video shops. Computers & Videos are expensive to purchase and this may account for the lower possession rate.
{ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS Children from classes 4 & 5 Emley First School, together with their teachers, Mrs. Christine Cudworth & Mr. Bob Laurie compiled this data.Mr.G.R. Brooke & Mrs.Cudworth were responsible for photography.
